select bi.*,b.code,b.gmt_create as bill_gmt_create from bill_item bi inner join bill b on bi.bill_id = b.id
and b.supplier_id = #{dto.supplierId}
and b.code like concat( '%', #{dto.code}, '%')
and bi.material_name like concat( '%', #{dto.materialName}, '%')
and bi.material_spec like concat( '%', #{dto.materialSpec}, '%')
and bi.id not in (select ii.bill_item_id from invoice_item ii) and b.status in (0,1)

select ii.*,b.code,b.gmt_create as bill_gmt_create, bi.material_spec_id,bi.material_code,bi.material_erp_code, bi.material_name,bi.material_trade_name,bi.material_spec, bi.manufacturer_name,bi.form,bi.qty,bi.subtotal_amount from invoice_item ii inner join bill_item bi on bi.id = ii.bill_item_id inner join bill b on bi.bill_id = b.id
and ii.invoice_line_id = #{dto.invoiceLineId}
and b.code like concat( '%', #{dto.code}, '%')
and bi.material_name like concat( '%', #{dto.materialName}, '%')
and bi.material_spec like concat( '%', #{dto.materialSpec}, '%')
order by ii.gmt_modified desc
